subject: Pedal Missing Hydraulic Damper
description_text:
Good morning,

I just received my pedals and everything looks great except the throttle is missing the hydraulic damper. I would prefer to not have to send everything back since it is already installed on my rig so if you could send a throttle hydraulic module I could install it and that would be greatly appreciated. The invoice is below.



Nicholas Williams

conversations.body_text: Hi Nicholas Williams,  Could you please provide a photo of the throttle pedal? We’ll verify it and arrange a replacement for you.
Hi Nicholas Williams,  Hi, I am sorry for the inconvenience caused. We have shipped a new hydraulic damper for you, here is your tracking number: JSEXV3061681346YQ, the shipping carrier is JSEXPRESS.
